channel.title: Openstack on purpleidea.com
channel.description: Recent content in Openstack on purpleidea.com

item.title: Copyleft is Dead. Long live Copyleft!
item.description: As you may have noticed, we recently re-licensed mgmt from the AGPL (Affero General Public License) to the regular GPL. This is a post explaining the decision and which hopefully includes some insights at the intersection of technology and legal issues. Disclaimer: I am not a lawyer, and these are not necessarily the opinions of my employer. I think I’m knowledgeable in this area, but I’m happy to be corrected in the comments.
